mil5.3.5:5.1_1: tena hi phandanena rukkhena bhāradvājena saha sallapitanti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.5:5.2_0: Yadi phandanena rukkhena bhāradvājena saddhiṁ sallapitaṁ,
mil5.3.5:5.2_1: tena hi rukkho acetanoti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.5:5.3_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.5:6.1_2: phandanena ca rukkhena bhāradvājena saddhiṁ sallapitaṁ,
mil5.3.5:6.2_1: acetanassa rukkhassa sallāpo nāma, api ca, mahārāja,
mil5.3.5:6.2_2: tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthāya devatāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ rukkhoti,
mil5.3.5:6.2_3: rukkho sallapatīti cesā lokapaṇṇatti, yathā, mahārāja,
mil5.3.5:6.2_4: sakaṭaṁ dhaññassa paripūritaṁ dhaññasakaṭanti jano voharati,
mil5.3.5:6.2_5: na ca taṁ dhaññamayaṁ sakaṭaṁ, rukkhamayaṁ sakaṭaṁ,
mil5.3.5:6.2_6: tasmiṁ sakaṭe dhaññassa pana ākiritattā dhaññasakaṭanti jano voharati;
mil5.3.5:6.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano,
mil5.3.5:6.3_1: yā pana tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā,
mil5.3.5:7.1_1: dadhiṁ manthayamāno takkaṁ manthemīti voharati, na taṁ takkaṁ, yaṁ so mantheti,
mil5.3.5:7.1_2: dadhiṁyeva so manthento takkaṁ manthemīti voharati;
mil5.3.5:7.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano.
mil5.3.5:7.3_0: Yā pana tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā,
mil5.3.5:8.1_1: asantaṁ sādhetukāmo santaṁ sādhemīti voharati, asiddhaṁ siddhanti voharati, evamesā lokasamaññā;
mil5.3.5:8.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano.
mil5.3.5:8.3_0: Yā pana tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā,
mil5.3.5:8.3_2: rukkho sallapatīti cesā lokapaṇṇatti, yāya, mahārāja, lokasamaññāya jano voharati,
mil5.3.5:8.3_3: tathāgatopi tāyeva lokasamaññāya sattānaṁ dhammaṁ desetī”ti.
